text: Roderick Lemonde MacFarquhar (2 December 1930 – 10 February 2019) was a British politician and journalist. He was a Harvard University professor. He was a Member of Parliament from 1974 to 1978. He was best known for his studies of Maoist China, the three-volume The Origins of the Cultural Revolution and Mao’s Last Revolution. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Harvard University faculty Category:English journalists Category:English historians Category:UK MPs 1974–1979 Category:Labour Party (UK) MPs
title: Roderick MacFarquhar
